attributes.action: I’d like to pay a penny more on my income tax to reward the hero’s from the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: Ask the general public if they are willing to have income tax increases by 1p
attributes.background: I’d like the government to review their decision to pay NHS staff only 1% as a pay award after all they have done to mitigate the impact of Covid-19

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Increase income tax/NI to give NHS staff a larger pay increase
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578466

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970
